statements: SELECT * FROM client_communications;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date FROM client_communications;
SELECT client_id, communication_type FROM client_communications;
SELECT communication_content FROM client_communications;
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890AB';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT communication_id FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-0987654321BA';
SELECT communication_date, communication_content FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'phone';
SELECT client_id, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'letter';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '34567890-5678-5678-5678-0987654321BA' AND communication_type = 'email';
SELECT client_id, communication_type FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '87654321-8765-8765-8765-1234567890BA' AND communication_type = 'phone';
SELECT communication_id, communication_type FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'email' AND communication_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '34567890-5678-5678-5678-0987654321BA' AND communication_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-0987654321BA';
SELECT communication_id, communication_content FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '87654321-8765-8765-8765-1234567890BA' AND communication_type = 'phone';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type = 'letter' AND communication_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '34567890-5678-5678-5678-0987654321BA' AND communication_type = 'email' AND communication_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT communication_id, communication_type FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '87654321-8765-8765-8765-1234567890BA' AND communication_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT communication_id, client_id, communication_type FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT client_id, COUNT(communication_id) AS num_communications FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id HAVING num_communications > 5;
SELECT client_id, communication_type FROM client_communications ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, AVG(LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id HAVING avg_content_length > 1000;
SELECT client_id, communication_type, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM communication_date) AS month FROM client_communications WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM communication_date) = 2022;
SELECT communication_type, COUNT(*) AS num_communications FROM client_communications GROUP BY communication_type ORDER BY num_communications DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT client_id, communication_type, COUNT(*) AS num_communications FROM client_communications WHERE communication_type IN ('email', 'phone') GROUP BY client_id, communication_type HAVING num_communications > 2;

SELECT client_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE client_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001') AND communication_type NOT IN ('sms') ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM client_communications;
SELECT EXTRACT(DOW FROM communication_date) AS day_of_week, COUNT(*) AS num_communications FROM client_communications GROUP BY day_of_week ORDER BY day_of_week ASC;

SELECT client_id, communication_type, COUNT(*) AS num_communications FROM client_communications WHERE communication_content LIKE '%important%' GROUP BY client_id, communication_type HAVING num_communications > 0;
SELECT client_id, MAX(communication_date) AS latest_communication FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date >= '2022-06-01 00:00:00' AND communication_date < '2022-07-01 00:00:00';
SELECT client_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE communication_date = (SELECT MAX(communication_date) FROM client_communications);
SELECT client_id, COUNT(DISTINCT communication_type) AS num_unique_types FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id HAVING num_unique_types > 1;
SELECT client_id, communication_type, AVG(LENGTH(communication_content)) AS avg_content_length FROM client_communications GROUP BY client_id, communication_type HAVING avg_content_length > 500;
SELECT client_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE EXTRACT(DOW FROM communication_date) = 1 OR EXTRACT(DOW FROM communication_date) = 5;
SELECT * FROM client_communications WHERE client_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND communication_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT client_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM client_communications WHERE communication_content ILIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, client_id, interaction_date FROM ClientInteractions;
SELECT client_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM ClientInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions;
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Clients;
SELECT phone_number, email FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients;

SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE address ILIKE '%avenue%';
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Clients WHERE address NOT LIKE '%PO Box%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT client_id, client_name, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT interaction_id, client_id, interaction_date FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM Clients WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'call';
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, address FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions WHERE client_id = 4 AND interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT client_id) FROM ClientInteractions;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM Clients WHERE client_id = 5 AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'meeting%';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM Clients WHERE address ILIKE '%Street%';
SELECT AVG(client_id) FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, phone_number, email FROM Clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT SUM(client_id) FROM Clients;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM ClientInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM Clients;
SELECT MAX(client_id) FROM Clients;
SELECT MIN(client_id) FROM Clients;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients;
SELECT * FROM communications;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT client_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM communications;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients;
SELECT communication_id, communication_content FROM communications;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM interactions;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT client_id, client_name, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM communications ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.client_name, i.interaction_date FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id;
SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(cm.communication_id) AS total_communications FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS average_interaction_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, MIN(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS min_interaction_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, MAX(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS max_interaction_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM communications ORDER BY communication_date;

SELECT c.client_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS total_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;
SELECT c.client_name FROM clients c LEFT JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id WHERE cm.client_id IS NULL;

SELECT c.client_name, COUNT(cm.communication_id) AS total_communications FROM clients c LEFT JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name HAVING COUNT(cm.communication_id) < 5;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients UNION SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients;

SELECT c.client_name, DATEDIFF(MAX(i.interaction_date), MIN(cm.communication_date)) AS total_interaction_span FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name;

SELECT c.client_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS total_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name HAVING SUM(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) > 30;

SELECT c.client_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(i.interaction_date, cm.communication_date)) AS average_response_time FROM clients c INNER JOIN communications cm ON c.client_id = cm.client_id INNER JOIN interactions i ON cm.communication_id = i.communication_id GROUP BY c.client_name HAVING COUNT(i.interaction_id) > 1;

SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM communications;
SELECT communication_type FROM communications WHERE communication_id = 1;
SELECT communication_date, communication_content FROM communications WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date = '2021-08-10';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_due_date > '2021-09-30';
SELECT client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM tasks WHERE task_due_date < '2021-10-15');
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM clients;
SELECT AVG(task_due_date) FROM tasks WHERE client_id = 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tasks WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(task_due_date) FROM tasks WHERE client_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Meeting');
SELECT clients.client_name, communications.communication_type FROM clients INNER JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id;
SELECT clients.client_name, tasks.task_name FROM clients LEFT JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id;
SELECT clients.client_name, interactions.interaction_description FROM clients RIGHT JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id;
SELECT clients.client_name, tasks.task_name, tasks.task_due_date FROM clients INNER JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE tasks.task_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_clients FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id GROUP BY clients.client_name;
SELECT client_name, AVG(task_due_date) AS average_due_date FROM clients INNER JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT MAX(communication_date) AS latest_communication_date FROM communications;
SELECT client_name, MAX(interaction_date) AS latest_interaction_date FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, MIN(task_due_date) AS earliest_due_date FROM clients INNER JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, SUM(CAST(task_due_date AS INT)) AS total_due_days FROM clients INNER JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), interaction_date)) AS average_days_since_interaction FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id GROUP BY client_name;

SELECT client_name, communication_type, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM clients INNER JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id GROUP BY client_name, communication_type;
SELECT client_name, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id GROUP BY client_name, interaction_type;
SELECT client_name, task_name, DATEDIFF(task_due_date, NOW()) AS days_remaining FROM clients INNER JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE DATEDIFF(task_due_date, NOW()) > 0;

SELECT client_name, interaction_description, DATEDIFF(NOW(), interaction_date) AS days_since_interaction FROM clients INNER JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), interaction_date) > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT note_text FROM notes WHERE interaction_id = 12;
SELECT task_description, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM interactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT communication_type, COUNT(*) AS communication_count FROM communications GROUP BY communication_type;
SELECT client_name, task_description, task_status FROM clients JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id;
SELECT client_id, AVG(task_due_date) AS avg_due_date FROM tasks GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_name, interaction_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT communication_type, DATE_FORMAT(communication_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM communications;
SELECT client_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id;
SELECT client_id, task_description, task_due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT client_id, SUM(DATEDIFF(task_due_date, CURDATE())) AS days_remaining FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_id, MIN(task_due_date) AS earliest_due_date FROM tasks GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT client_name, note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, communication_type, communication_date FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id;
SELECT clients.client_name, interactions.interaction_type, interactions.interaction_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id;
SELECT client_name, note_text, note_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id;
SELECT client_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE tasks.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT client_name, interaction_type, note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id;
SELECT client_name, communication_type, task_description FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id;
SELECT client_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE tasks.task_due_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT client_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE tasks.task_status != 'Completed';

SELECT client_name, communication_type, interaction_type, note_text FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id;

SELECT clients.client_name, interactions.interaction_type, notes.note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id WHERE interactions.interaction_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT client_name, communication_type, communication_date FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT client_name, interaction_type, note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT client_name, interaction_type, note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT client_name, task_description, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE task_description LIKE '%urgent%';

SELECT clients.client_name, interactions.interaction_type, notes.note_text FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id WHERE notes.note_text LIKE '%important%';

SELECT client_name, communication_type, interaction_type, note_text, task_description FROM clients JOIN communications ON clients.client_id = communications.client_id JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id;

SELECT client_name, interaction_date, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Phone Call' AND tasks.task_status = 'Pending';

SELECT client_name, interaction_date, note_date, task_due_date FROM clients JOIN interactions ON clients.client_id = interactions.client_id JOIN notes ON interactions.interaction_id = notes.interaction_id JOIN tasks ON clients.client_id = tasks.client_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Email' AND notes.note_date > '2022-01-01';
